welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bangor, a charming city in the United States known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and warm hospitality. Get ready to explore and experience the beauty of Bangor, we hope you enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bangor International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bangor International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'BGR Free WiFi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Old Town Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal of Old Town Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
